name: Jira
description: This plugin is used to create tickets for selected Jira projects on the Jira Cloud Platform. It also supports updating tickets and syncing their status.

fields.label: Jira Cloud Instance URL
fields.description: Jira Cloud instance URL. e.g. https://<your-domain>.atlassian.net.

fields.label: Email Address
fields.description: Email address of the Jira user. User should have access to read Projects and Create/Update issues on Jira Cloud Platform.

fields.label: API Token
fields.description: API token of the Jira user. API token for user can be generated from Account > Manage account > Security > API Tokens > Create and manage API tokens.

fields.label: Jira Issue Type(s)
fields.description: Enter comma separated values of Jira issue types (values are case sensitive).
